text:
Al Barakah Hypermarket @ Joo Chiat Road

Al Barakah at Joo Chiat Road is a fantastic shop with a wide range of quality products, from supplements and frozen food to beautifully packaged dates. It‚Äôs a one-stop destination for anyone looking for meaningful and practical items.

The store is clean, well-organized, and stocked with a variety of products. I was particularly impressed by the selection of supplements available, which were reasonably priced and of great quality. The frozen food section was also a highlight, offering convenient and delicious options. The dates sold here were beautifully packaged and perfect for gifting or enjoying at home.

The staff or maybe one of the owner the cheerful gentleman were extremely kind and attentive, always ready to help with recommendations and ensure a smooth shopping experience. Their warm and sincere service made my visit even more enjoyable.

If you‚Äôre in Joo Chiat, Al Barakah is a must-visit. Whether you‚Äôre shopping for daily essentials, gifts, or unique food items, this shop has everything you need. Highly recommended!

48,Joo Chiat team shows a very vibrant atmosphere & has a positive attitude amongst them.Truly an amazing team compared to other outlets which I have shopped before!
Very friendly & knowledgeable staff!!

I went there on 29/12 afternoon to buy 4 bottles of Ruqyah spray but sad to say.The counter there's a guy & a lady instead of serving me coz the items at the top of the shelf.Both of them bz talking abt other staff.Luckily my husband can reached the items.To the both staff pls concentrate on customer k.Tq!
From household products to snacks all under one roof. My fav singkong balado 4 $10.
My go to place for kurma as its quality is top notch. But of coz, when I'm there, I can't help but to purchase all the pre-mix and frozen food. It's affordable and has many variety.
